type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.GenerateEclipseClasspath
type.description:
Generates an Eclipse .classpath file. If you want to fine tune the eclipse configuration

At this moment nearly all configuration is done via EclipseClasspath.

method.name: getClasspath
method.description: The Eclipse Classpath model containing the information required to generate the classpath file.

property.name: classpath
property.description: The Eclipse Classpath model containing the information required to generate the classpath file.
